recipe.title: Blackberry and Ginger Cocktail
instructions: Muddle 1/2 pint blackberries and 8 mint sprigs in a large pitcher. Mix in 1 1/2 cups vodka, 1 cup fresh lime juice, and three 12-ounce cans or bottles ginger beer. Serve over ice garnished with more mint.
